item.title: Trump says he may go to Egypt soon for Gaza deal
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he may travel to Egypt this weekend as his negotiators seek to seal a Gaza hostages-for-ceasefire deal.

item.title: Florida man charged with intentionally setting Pacific Palisades fire in LA
item.description: The Palisades Fire in early January burned thousands of homes and killed multiple people as flames spread rapidly in heavy winds up to 100 miles per h...

item.title: IRS furloughs nearly half of its workforce due to government shutdown
item.description: The IRS furloughs came on the same day that the Senate again fell short of passing a funding resolution that would end the federal government shutdown...

item.title: Senate again rejects funding bills as government shutdown enters second week

item.title: James Comey trial set for Jan. 5 on charges sought by Trump
item.description: "My family and I have known for years that there are costs to standing up to Donald Trump," former FBI Director James Comey said after being indicted.
